{!HS_Activity__c.YP_First_name_from_HS_Application_Form__c}, well done for attending your Welcome Session!
Next Steps Your Welcome Session counts towards your 16 hours of volunteering, so you can now log your hours on the HeadStart website using the guidance and log-in details below!
Log-In Details
Username: {!Contact.Email} Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
Not sure when your next volunteering session will be?
Then contact your charity using the details below:
Manager’s name: {!HS_Activity__c.Main_Contact__c} Manager’s Email address: {!HS_Activity__c.Main_contact_email__c} Manager’s telephone number: {!HS_Activity__c.Main_contact_number__c}
Great work so far. You are well on your way to achieving 16 hours which will allow you to access exclusive skill-building workshops and your job interview!
If you have any difficulties or need to ask us a question, please email us at headstart@the-challenge.org.
